pkgmetadata.longdescription: # App Settings Dictionary![Tests](https://github.com/wheelercj/app_settings/actions/workflows/tests.yaml/badge.svg)A dictionary-like Settings class for managing an application's settings.Install with `pip install app-settings-dict`. Import with `from app_settings_dict import Settings`.See examples of use in [the test file](https://github.com/wheelercj/app_settings/blob/main/tests/test_app_settings_dict.py) and in [zk-ssg](https://github.com/wheelercj/zk-ssg/blob/main/ssg/settings.py)'s settings file.
